title: Another 125 schools to become National Schools
content: Sri Lankaâ€™s Ministry of Education said that another 125 schools would be elevated to the National School level. National Schools Director Kithsiri Liyanagama speaking to News1st said 125 Divisional Secretariats with zero national schools will be designated a national school each.The National Schools Director also said that 9 schools in 9 provinces were converted to National Schools. At present, there are 382 National Schools operating in Sri Lanka and the objective of the National Schools program is to award a better education experience for students.
